mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tip (writer, title, contents, tag_id, img_src) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{tag_id}, #{img_src})
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT count(*) FROM tip_like WHERE tip_id=tip.id) AS likes FROM tip
SELECT *, (SELECT count(*) FROM tip_like WHERE tip_id=tip.id) AS likes FROM tip WHERE tag_id=#{tag_id}
SELECT *, (SELECT count(*) FROM tip_like WHERE tip_id=tip.id) AS likes FROM tip WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')

SELECT *, (SELECT count(*) FROM tip_like WHERE tip_id=tip.id) AS likes FROM tip WHERE (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')) AND tag_id=#{tag_id}
SELECT *, (SELECT count(*) FROM tip_like WHERE tip_id=tip.id) AS likes FROM tip WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM tip WHERE id in (SELECT tip_id FROM scrap WHERE user_id=#{user_id})
SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tip_like WHERE tip_id=id) AS likes FROM tip ORDER BY (likes + hits) DESC, likes DESC, created_at DESC LIMIT 5
